Text:
Aspect ratio is incorrect, and many small skips in playback (tested with VLC, MPC (3 different flavours), WMP, and Nero Showtime).

That said, this is the only copy I've been able to find, so thanks to uploader.
Ooops. Never mind comment about skips in playback above, it was a problem on my end.
@Scinik as i said it is a tvrip the aspect ratio is as near as i could get from a tv recording they very rarely show it as it's supposed to be

Quality is very good, considering it's a TVrip of an older film, and aspect ratio issue is easily dealt with through in-player controls.

This movie is FUNNY, in a post-modern hipster cynic kind of way. For even more fun, every time someone says the word "communist", imagine they said "atheist". :D

And Nancy Olson was hawt in the day (see her in Sunset Boulevard http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0043014/ , as well).

I'm revising my above comment to BIG THANKS to uploader. :)
